definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: Down there the earth was never still.
sentences.chinese: 地底深处从来没有平静过。

sentences.english: Pools of sulfuric acid are indications that deep underground there are titanic stirrings .
sentences.chinese: 一个个的硫酸池说明了在深地底下藏有著巨大能源。

sentences.english: But those that seek my soul, to destroy it, shall go into the lower parts of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 但那些寻索要灭我命的人，必往地底下去。

sentences.english: It just bury the fruit into the soil and dont allowed to be digged out until ripe.
sentences.chinese: 它只把果子埋在地底，等到成熟，才容人把它挖出来。

sentences.english: This effect can only be reduced by moving deeper underground.
sentences.chinese: 这种影响只能靠进入更深的地底来进行削减。

sentences.english: Other types of bee make their nests in holes in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 其他种的蜂在地底下的洞筑它们的巢。

sentences.english: Other steps send me hurrying back underneath the ground.
sentences.chinese: 其他人的脚步催使我躲入地底。

sentences.english: Until they are ripe and dug up by people . When you come upon a lonely peanut plant.
sentences.chinese: 它只把果子埋在地底，等到成熟才让人把它挖出来。

sentences.english: That city is buried many layers down.
sentences.chinese: 过去的事儿了，都在地底下多少层了。

sentences.english: Hoffman was clearly hoping that the ground night swallow him at that second.
sentences.chinese: 那一刻霍夫曼真想钻到地底下去。

sentences.english: The miners were trapped underground for days after the entrance to the mine collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 矿井的入口处坍塌了，矿工在地底下受困好几天。

sentences.english: The roots of these tresses entwine under the ground.
sentences.chinese: 树根在地底下纠缠在一起。

sentences.english: A mouse leads a clandestine life below the ground.
sentences.chinese: 一只耗子能够引向地底之下的秘密生命。

sentences.english: Beholders usually carve out underground lairs for themselves using their disintegrate rays.
sentences.chinese: 眼魔经常用它们的解离射线雕刻自己的地底巢穴。

sentences.english: This ruby draws from the underground of flaming volcano capillary in, extremely precious rare.
sentences.chinese: 这红玉取自炎火山脉的地底之中，极为珍贵难得。

sentences.english: Inside the volcano, a pipe leads down far underground, where it is very hot.
sentences.chinese: 在火山内部，一条通道一直向下通到温度很高的地底。

definition: Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
